record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2293 AND S. 2294
record.narrative:
MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2293 AND S. 2294 -- (Senate - November 02, 2007)

[Page: S13717]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, it is my understanding there are two bills at the desk due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bills by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2293) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the individual alternative minimum tax, and for other purposes.
A bill (S. 2294) to strengthen immigration enforcement and border security, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to these bills.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The measures will be placed on the calendar.
